code: import React,{useRef}from'react';import emailjs from'@emailjs/browser';import'../css/ContactUs.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ContactUs=()=>{const form=useRef();const sendEmail=e=>{e.preventDefault();emailjs.sendForm(process.env.REACT_APP_YOUR_SERVICE_ID,process.env.REACT_APP_YOUR_TEMPLATE_ID,form.current,{publicKey:process.env.REACT_APP_YOUR_PUBLIC_KEY}).then(()=>{console.log('SUCCESS!');},error=>{console.log('FAILED...',error.text);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"contact-us-section",id:"ContactUs",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Contact Us"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{ref:form,onSubmit:sendEmail,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Name*",name:"user_name",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email*",name:"user_email",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"tel",placeholder:"Mobile*",name:"user_mobile",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{type:"text",placeholder:"Message",name:"message"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn",children:"Submit"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"map-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("iframe",{title:"Google Map",src:"https://www.google.com/maps/embed?pb=!1m18!1m12!1m3!1d7012.258070173128!2d77.06659249065892!3d28.424198164528485!2m3!1f0!2f0!3f0!3m2!1i1024!2i768!4f13.1!3m3!1m2!1s0x390d1dc381b69df1%3A0x720b75062c34df92!2sEmerald%20Plaza%2C%20Sector%2065%2C%20Gurugram%2C%20Haryana%20122102!5e0!3m2!1sen!2sin!4v1637598288831!5m2!1sen!2sin",width:"100%",height:"400",allowFullScreen:"",loading:"lazy"})})]});};export default ContactUs;
